promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a gigantic special deer normal-type pokemon wearing a regal crystal headband. It can be found in grassland-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, normal or deer. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Crystantler, a a gigantic special deer normal-type pokemon. It can be found in grassland-like environments It has the following abilities: Sensitive Blade. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "deer", "normal" or "Crystantler". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, deer-like, special, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pastel colors
generatedDescription: This majestic creature roams grassy plains, wielding its Sensitive Blade antlers to detect and dazzle potential foes with a prismatic dance.
